channel.title: Help me make this npc talk

item.title: Help me make this npc talk
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

help me with this i try to make my npc talk but he only says the first line and this is what it looks like:

case 124: talk("Hello, this is the start of the new!", 252); break; case 125: talk("CHRISTMAS EVENT!", 252); break; case 126: talk("However,it's still in progress,", 252); break; case 127: talk("So keep your pants on!", 252); break; case 128: choice("Awesome!", "oh."); break;
but he only says "hello this is the start of the new!"part and doesnt say the rest what am i doing wrong?

Read full topic
item.source: Help me make this npc talk
